content.rendered:
ProdPro Analytics offers clients access to historical market trends and analysis in an easy-to-use business intelligence tool.

New TV/film market intel service empowers organizations across the industry to answer strategic questions and increase visibility into upcoming productions.

Our mission is to create the tool we wished we had in our past ventures—a platform offering clear insights into upcoming productions and data-driven guidance for informed decision-making.”

— Alexander LoVerde, CEO of ProdPro

NEW YORK, NEW YORK, UNITED STATES, November 1, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — ProdPro, the first production intelligence platform designed for businesses who service TV/film productions, today launched their latest product, Analytics– a market intelligence tool purpose-built for businesses looking for better data on where physical production is heading, and how that impacts the studio and indie supply chains. The new product offers a dynamic dashboard to visualize the number of productions starting principal photography, production activity by shooting location, and aggregate trends on studio spending. Users can create custom reports in a drag-and-drop report builder and access a library of 50+ templates to kickstart analysis.

ProdPro was founded by Alexander LoVerde and Jeffrey Impey, serial entrepreneurs who previously started SyncOnSet, an Emmy-winning software platform for managing production that was acquired by Entertainment Partners in 2020. ProdPro was born out of the founders’ desire for a better way to run their business and increase sales to TV/film productions. ProdPro was initially incubated and funded by Overlook Partners, an investment and operating company the pair founded to explore and accelerate new ventures.

“Our mission is to create the tool we wished we had in our past ventures—a platform offering clear insights into upcoming productions and data-driven guidance for informed decision-making,” stated LoVerde, co-founder and CEO. Formerly at the helm of strategic partnerships at Entertainment Partners, a leading entertainment payroll company, LoVerde recognized a distinct industry gap. “Many firms focus on audience metrics, box office statistics, and content consumption. However, there’s been a significant void in data for the businesses and professionals directly involved in actual production operations.”

Launched in April of 2022, ProdPro already has brought on dozens of leading industry suppliers as clients, including Hackman’s Manhattan Beach Studios, ARRI Rental Group, and visual effects firm Crafty Apes.

“We looked far and wide for a daily updated tracker on all projects worldwide for our CRM purposes, and nothing existed until ProdPro invented it. In the ever-evolving world of film and television, ProdPro’s innovation has become an indispensable asset, fueling our operations with timely and actionable data.” – Chris Ledoux, Co-Founder of Crafty Apes.

Launching this month, ProdPro Analytics is swiftly capturing the attention of production suppliers, top-tier studios, financial experts, and industry guilds. “Designing and developing the Analytics platform was more than just another initiative—it was a passion project for me. It’s been a journey to solve a problem I deeply care about, and I’m thrilled to see the reaction it’s getting with our community,” remarks Jeffrey Impey, co-founder and COO, formerly leading sales operations at Entertainment Partners. For further information on ProdPro, email the team at contact@prodpro.com.

About ProdPro

ProdPro is the only market intelligence platform tailored for the production-side of the entertainment industry, delivering unparalleled data, insights, and networking opportunities to businesses and professionals integral to content production. Merging the expertise of its dedicated in-house research team with cutting-edge web monitoring technology, ProdPro offers unrivaled insights into both studio and independent production supply chains through a user-friendly software interface. With a focus on empowering industry suppliers and production crews, ProdPro aids in job discovery and keeps its users at the forefront of industry trends. Established in 2022, ProdPro is already trusted by many of the industry’s leading suppliers, including: Manhattan Beach Studios, Arri Camera Rental, Formosa Group, and Cinespace Studios. ProdPro’s exclusive research on market trends has been cited by The New York Times.

About Overlook Partners

Overlook Partners is an investment and operating company focused on building businesses in vertical markets that can have a lasting impact on the industries they operate in. Overlook Partners looks to start, invest in, and acquire businesses that solve problems often overlooked by the latest industry trends. The team has also been tapped to advise on major private equity transactions, leveraging their deep expertise of vertical software-as-a-service businesses to identify undervalued assets. Launched in 2022, Overlook Partners portfolio and clients include ProdPro and Integrated Media Company (a TPG Company).

Scott Geyman – Director of Operations & Product
ProdPro, Inc.
contact@prodpro.com
Visit us on social media:

LinkedIn
Instagram

You just read:

News Provided By

November 01, 2023, 11:00 GMT

As a user, if you see something we have missed, please do bring it to our attention. Your help is welcome. EIN Presswire, Everyone’s Internet News Presswire,

Editorial Guidelines
for more information.
